document_data.mainbody:
Drawn Sword Alley was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Drawn Sword Alley was found in Waterdeeps Dock Ward. The alley branched southeast off of Watchrun Alley and then turned due south at the intersection with Leeras Alley. It terminated at Gut Alley just one building south of its intersection with Nelnuks Walk.
